content: runescape party hat strap chain 72 or any multiple of 9 chain 1 turn row 1 half_double_crochet in the back bump of each stitch across chain 1 turn 72 row 2 - 4 half_double_crochet across chain 1 turn 72 row 5 single_crochet across chain 1 turn 72 crown points row 1 single_crochet in 9 sts leave the rest unworked chain 1 turn 9 row 2 single_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn 9 row 3 decrease single_crochet in each st until 2 sts remain decrease ch1 turn 7 row 4 single_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn 7 row 5 decrease single_crochet in each st until 2 sts remain decrease ch1 turn 5 row 6 single_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn 5 row 7 decrease single_crochet decrease ch1 turn 3 row 8 single_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn 3 row 9 sc3tog do not turn 1 fasten_off leaving a 3 inch tail we will hide the tail in the border reconnect working yarn to the strap by chaining one in the most left post of the previous triangle then repeat row 1-9 for all remaining crown points 8 border reconnect working yarn to edge of the strap single_crochet around the entire hat to give it a nice border be sure to encase your previous yarn tails inside your border scs pro tip chain 2 at the corners and at each crown point to turn the corner join with slip_stitch in the first single_crochet of the border round leaving a long tail for sewing sew the strap together using the whip stitch method weave in any remaining tails
